thread.title: Fat taxes? Overweight people already pay more

author: Katie Morley
title: Fat taxes? Overweight people already pay more
text: Fat taxes? Overweight people already pay more Obesity is a growing financial burden for Britain. But being overweight could also affect your personal finances Experts said Britain’s soaring obesity rates were fuelling “alarming” levels of disease Photo: Alamy
